content.rendered:
Directed by Amal Neerad.

Written by Shibin Francis.

Cast Dulquer Salmaan(Aji Mathew). Karthika Muraleedharan(Sarah Mary Kurian). Siddique(Mathew). Chandini Sreedharan(Pallavi). John Vijay(Arul Jebbaraj Peter). Dileesh Pothan(Hari). Soubin Shahir(Jomon). Jinu Joseph(Cyril). Maala Parvathi(Aji’s Mother (as Parvathi T.)). Maniyanpilla Raju(Baby) . Geo Abraham(Wedding Guest). Julio Antonio Alonzo(Julio). Murillo Alves(Guide). Sarath Chandran(Ragging student). Surabhi Lakshmi(Hari’s Wife). Alencier Ley Lopez(Politician). Sandeep Narayan(Police Constable). Amir Natan(Imtiaz Ali Khan (as Nathan Amir)). Sumit Naval(Che Guevara).Len Prasad. Sujith Shanker(Manoj (as Sujith Sankar)). Angel Shijoy(Chandini Sreedharan (voice)). V.K. Sriraman(Priest (Cameo)). Sal Yusuf(Karl Marx). Sajesh Mohan(Sakhavu (uncredited))

Languages Malayalam. Spanish. English.

Producers Geo Abraham. Prassanth Kumar Chandran. Amal Neerad. Arun Kumar V.R.. Chris A. Wilks.

Production Amal Neerad Productions.
